=== Ubuntu freezes afecting translations ===

Each Ubuntu release follows the translations-related deadlines and milestones below. You can check the exact date for each milestone in the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Releases | Release Schedule ]]</nowiki> for each particular Ubuntu release.

* <nowiki>[[UserInterfaceFreeze | User interface freeze ]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[DocumentationStringFreeze | Documentation string freeze]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[NonLanguagePackTranslationDeadline | Non language pack deadline]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[LanguagePackTranslationDeadline | Language pack deadline]]</nowiki>
